message:
SYSTEM: ODPs-v7.pdf: Página 14
14 
ODPs Reuse: Methodological Guidelines (V) 
14 
If a requirement is about types and subtypes of a given 
concept,  
then the “Taxonomy (AP-TX-01)” pattern could be 
reused 
If a requirement is about parts of something,  
then the “Componency”, “Componency (CP-COM-01)” 
or “Part-Whole Relation (CP-PW-01)” patterns could be 
reused 
If a requirement mentions something about a list of 
values,  
then 
the 
“Specified 
Values 
in 
OWL: 
"value 
partitions" and "value sets"”, the “Specified Values: 
Set of Individuals (LP-SV-01)” or the “Specified 
Values: Subclasses (LP-SV-02)” patterns could be 
reused. 
Some heuristics
